data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FIZz9xFf6pwQ7kNvgE6r-GS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBVTmwr5DEeeH9PTs3Zh14AWr2TwF2DH94rehQndf0WKQ&oe=669B9DB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XUF1om_DcpoQ7kNvgHIAGT5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgNgJ95Eb6OWKXFG7agt0fydS-H2dEIKZk-3LiGxMvkw&oe=669BAB52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1R2o8_6dt8EQ7kNvgHsrnZ6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBWn5VlyDfxpBru3X4fIIjQT2jUKRcYZIv1_STYiuGOfQ&oe=669B9689)
